main_content.p: Funda-funda nje, khangela okuthile kuwo, kanjalo wuqonde uMgaqosiseko WaseMzantsi Afrika, uqonde nendlela othetha ngayo naye wonke umntu.

features_content.constitution_text: Funda-funda nje; khangela; okanye ufunde uguqulelo loMgaqosiseko lwakutsha nje: olufakelwe izinto ezintsha, lwaza lwaqiniswa
features_content.guides_text: Izikhokelo ezikhawuleza zikuqondise injongo nentsingiselo yecandelo ngalinye leXhwebhu  Lamalungelo, kwaneyezahluko ezithile zoMgaqosiseko ezisetyenziswa kakhulu.
features_content.rules_text: Izikhokelo ezifikelelekayo ezicacisa malunga nokutolikwa ngegunya koMgaqosiseko okwenziwa yiNkundla YoMgaqosiseko YaseMzantsi Afrika.
features_content.case_text: Yifunda-funde uyigqibe ngokukhawuleza yonke inguqulelo Yemigaqo YeNdlu YeNdibano YeSizwe, inguqulelo efakelwe izinto ezintsha, yaqiniswa.
features_content.search_text: Khangela kuwo wonke uMgaqosiseko, okanye kuyo yonke Imigaqo, okanye kuzo zonke Izikhokelo, okanye kuwo onke Amatyala ukuze ufumane ezo nkcukacha zolwazi uzifunayo.
